settings.api_token_help: Create a personal access token at https://github.com/settings/tokens/new with the user and read:org scopes. This token is used to fetch your sponsor information from GitHub.
settings.account_type_help: Select whether you're tracking sponsors for a personal GitHub user account or an organization account.
settings.login_help: Enter your GitHub username (for user accounts) or organization name (for organizations). This is the account whose sponsors will be synchronized.
settings.group_help: Select which Flarum user group sponsors should be added to. Users will be automatically added when they become sponsors and removed when they stop sponsoring.
